content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 28 Apr 2019Are you able to use authorise transactions from online banking whilst overseas? 2 answersAnswerBump0

Charmaine Ng, The Value Maximizer at @ Every Ma La Xiang Guo StallLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 28 Apr 2019Yes, you can. Just make sure that if you're using OTP option then bring your tokens along. If you're using SMS version, make sure you activated roaming for the number registered. I usually bring along my tokens as a precaution too. ðŸ˜€Please upvote me if my answer is useful!0 comments0
